data.title: Black Widow star Olga Kuryleonk net worth, partner, relationship
data.meta_description: Olga Kurylenko net worth $20 million. She is living high life with her son Alexander Max Horatio and partner Max Benitz. her relationships
data.text:
Olga Konstantinovna Kurylenko is a model and actress of Ukrainian and French origin. In the film adaptation of the video game “Hitman,” she portrays Nika Boronia.In the Marvel Cinematic Universe (MCU) film Black Widow, she portrayed Antonia Dreykov / Taskmaster, which was released on June 29, 2021. Her acting career has netted millions of dollars. She’s in a relationship with her partner Max Benitz. Scroll down to know all the information regarding Olga Kurylenko net worth, earnings, career, partner, husband, marriage, children, and much more:

Olga Kurylenko net worth, earnings, income, and all the way she makes her fortune

She has been captivating the hearts of fans for over twenty five years and is one of Hollywood’s most successful actresses. She has achieved a great lot of fame and money as an actress and model as a result of her talent and hard work. Olga Kurylenko net worth $20 million. She has appeared in a number of television shows and films, as well as commercials for various brands and products. .In the Marvel Cinematic Universe (MCU) film Black Widow, she portrayed Antonia Dreykov / Taskmaster, which was released on June 29, 2021. Is also added to Olga Kurylenko net worth.

Read More: Skam France star Robin Migne biography, dating, girlfriend

Olga is also an excellent actress. Among her major works are ‘A Perfect Day,’ ‘The Water Diviner,’ ‘The November Man,’ ‘Gun Shy,’ ‘The Death of Stalin,’ ‘Correspondence,’ ‘Momentum,’ ‘Vampire Academy,’ ‘Magic City,’ ‘Seven Psychopaths,’ ‘Centurion,’ and ‘Oblivion.’ In reality, her passion, devotion, and hard work are what propelled her to the position she presently holds.

When did she start her career?

Kurylenko went to Moscow from her hometown of Berdyansk when she was 15 years old. She relocated to Paris when she was 16 years old. She signed a contract with the Paris-based Madison modeling agency in 1996, where she met her publicist Valérie Rosen. By the following year, she had appeared on the covers of Vogue and Elle magazines at the age of 18. Kurylenko supported her mother in Ukraine while working as a model in Paris.

Olga was also featured on the covers of Marie Claire and Madame Figaro magazines. Above all, she has collaborated with brand ambassadors such as Bebe, Clarins, and Helena Rubinstein. Olga is also an excellent actress. Among her major works are ‘A Perfect Day,’ ‘The Water Diviner,’ ‘The November Man,’ ‘Gun Shy,’ ‘The Death of Stalin,’ ‘Correspondence,’ ‘Momentum,’ ‘Vampire Academy,’ ‘Magic City,’ ‘Seven Psychopaths,’ ‘Centurion,’ and ‘Oblivion.’

She also played a Russian spy in Rowan Atkinson’s comedy Johnny English Strikes Again (2018). She appeared in the action thriller Sentinelle in 2021. The following year, she starred as Antonia Dreykov / Taskmaster in the Marvel Cinematic Universe (MCU) film Black Widow.

Awards and Achievements

Olga has garnered various awards and honors for her outstanding acting and modeling abilities. Kurylenko won the Saturn Award in 2009 and was nominated for an EDA Special Mention Award in 2013. In addition, in 2012, she received the BSFC Award for ‘Seven Psychopaths.’ Overall, she has two wins and five nominations for various awards.

Read More: Actress Marilyn Lima net worth, earnings, home, boyfriend

Who is Olga Kurylenko partner? She is married twice in her life

Olga Kurylenko not only married once, but she also divorced twice. Initially, she walked down the aisle with Cedric van Mol, a French fashion photographer. According to reports, the couple married around 2000. Their marriage, however, soured and they divorced four years later. Olga looked to have found love again two years later. In 2006, she married Damian Gabrielle, a mobile phone accessories entrepreneur from the United States. 0020 In late 2007, the marriage ended in divorce.

Olga relocated to the United Kingdom following her appearance in Quantum of Solace. She met her writer, Max Benitz, there and they hit it off. Olga’s relationship with her then-boyfriend Max was quite low-key. The romance was only revealed in 2015, when the Bond girl said she was expecting a child. On November 3, 2015, the writer and actress couple had their first child together. Alexander Max Horatio, their son, is now six years old.
